subjectArea.name: HCM - Workforce Rewards - Payroll Management
subjectArea.description: Payroll management subject area provides insights into payroll balances at the person level and cumulative balance values across dimensions like PSU, TRU and other common dimensions across all base categories. Also enabling trends across time periods and identify anomalies, if any.
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Payroll Run Balances.Balance Value
